com.datastax.driver.core.policies

Interface ChainableLoadBalancingPolicy

  • All Superinterfaces:
    LoadBalancingPolicy
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ErrorAwarePolicy, HostFilterPolicy, LatencyAwarePolicy, TokenAwarePolicy, WhiteListPolicy

    public interface ChainableLoadBalancingPolicy
extends LoadBalancingPolicy
    A load balancing policy that wraps another policy.
